name: Circuit Pauser or Splitter Rebate
description: Up to $50 rebate for circuit pauser/splitter to enable electrification without panel upgrade; income-qualified customers may receive up to $150
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for circuit pausers/splitters that allow Santa Clara residents to add electric appliances without expensive panel upgrades.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $50 rebate for circuit pauser/splitter
- Up to $150 for income-qualified customers
- Enables electrification without panel upgrade
- Smart load management device
- Works with multiple appliances
- Cost-effective alternative to panel upgrade
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Must apply as add-on to other SVP electrification rebate
3. Purchase qualifying circuit pauser/splitter
4. Have device installed by licensed electrician
5. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
6. Submit with main rebate application
